encoding.description: Encoding to apply. If present, overrides the marshaler configuration option.

s3_bucket.description: S3Bucket indicates the mapping of the bucket name used for uploading to a specific resource attribute value.

s3_prefix.description: S3Prefix indicates the mapping of the key (directory) prefix used for writing into the bucket to a specific resource attribute value.

acl.description: ACL is the canned ACL to use when uploading objects.

compression.description: Compression sets the algorithm used to process the payload before uploading to S3. Valid values are: `gzip`, `zstd`, or no value set.

disable_ssl.description: DisableSLL forces communication to happen via HTTP instead of HTTPS.

endpoint.description: Endpoint is the URL used for communicated with S3.

file_prefix.description: FilePrefix is the filename prefix used for the file to avoid any potential collisions.

retry_max_attempts.description: RetryMaxAttempts specifies the maximum number of attempts for S3 client. Default is 3 (SDK default).

retry_max_backoff.description: RetryMaxBackoff specifies the maximum backoff delay for S3 client. Default is 20 seconds (SDK default).

retry_mode.description: RetryMode specifies the retry mode for S3 client, default is "standard". Valid values are: "standard", "adaptive", or "nop". "nop" will disable retry by setting the retryer to aws.NopRetryer.

role_arn.description: RoleArn is the role policy to use when interacting with S3

s3_base_prefix.description: S3BasePrefix is the root key (directory) prefix used to write the file.

s3_bucket.description: S3Bucket is the bucket name to be uploaded to.

s3_force_path_style.description: S3ForcePathStyle sets the value for force path style.

s3_partition_format.description: S3PartitionFormat is used to provide the rollup on how data is written. Uses [strftime](https://www.man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/strftime.3.html) formatting.

s3_partition_timezone.description: S3PartitionTimezone is used to provide timezone for partition time. Defaults to Local timezone.

s3_prefix.description: S3Prefix is the key (directory) prefix to write to inside the bucket. Appended to S3BasePrefix if provided.

unique_key_func_name.description: UniqueKeyFuncName specifies a function to use for generating a unique string as part of the S3 key. If unspecified, a default function will be used that generates a random string. Valid values are: "uuidv7"

timeoutsettings.description: squash ensures fields are correctly decoded in embedded struct.
